basic.description: (CURR 345 Music-Vocal candidates only, CURR 365 Music-Instrumental candadates only; both are combined in one class.) Provides an initial orientation to music teaching at the secondary level with emphasis on both choral and instrumental music.  Lesson and unit planning are practiced in the context of exploring teaching and authentic assessment strategies that meet Ontario curriculum requirements.
basic.subject: CURR
basic.title: Intro Teach Choral Music (IS)
